attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a law-abiding citizen, I am sick of criminals such as burglars, joyriders, thugs, paedophiles, rapists and killers getting ridiculously low prison sentences. Or, in some cases, not getting prison at all. The people who conduct themselves within the law deserve to feel safe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
